description:
BUILD AN AMAZING AMUSEMENT PARK – FOR FREE! Inspired by the best-selling Theme Park series, enjoy an all-new experience made just for mobile! 

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings. See http://support.apple.com/kb/HT4213 for more info.

Now give your visitors something to remember with all-new attractions and quests. Also, let them quench their thirst for fun with Dr Pepper rides and shops!

WANT TO BE A THEME PARK MOGUL? 
• Create awesome attractions like the Shuttle Voyage, Chainsaw Spinner, Pirate Ships, and more
• Drink in excitement with the new Dr Pepper Rocket Ride, Dr Pepper Soda Shop, and more
• Watch your park come alive with ultra bright graphics and vivid animations
• Tap your attractions to enjoy fun mini games that make the rides run faster
• Use Super Tickets to earn more cash and unlock new rides without the wait

Thanks to everyone’s feedback, we've made this version of Theme Park the best yet – so get ready for the ride of your life!

PLEASE NOTE:Theme Park is free to play, but you can purchase additional in-app content. Remember, you can turn off In-App Purchases in the Settings of your device.

You must be 13+ to play this game.

Terms of Service : http://www.ea.com/terms-of-service
Privacy and Cookie  Policy:  http://www.ea.com/privacy-policy
Game EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/
Visit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.
EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.

Important Consumer Information.  This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply); Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy, TOS and EULA; Includes in-game advertising; Collects data though third party ad serving and analytics technology (See Privacy & Cookie Policy for details); Contains direct links to social networking sites intended for an audience over 13; Contains direct links to the Internet.
releaseNotes:
Greetings, Theme Park enthusiasts!

Think you had scary rides before? In our latest game update, we’ve added five MONSTROUS new rides, including:

- Voyage of Doom – Lure guests onto a pirate ship with promises of adventure. Tentacles? What tentacles?
- Nightmare Motel – There’s a vacancy!  Check guests in today and if they’re lucky, they might check out.
- Loch Ness Bubble Bath – Perhaps your guests might want a nice, relaxing dip. Don’t worry, Nessie doesn’t mind sharing.
- Big Foot-Loose – For guests who want to bust a move, it’s time to kick it with Bigfoot.
- Terror Trove – For the bravest guests only.

Whose park has the scariest rides?  With this update, yours just might!
